regular-body:
Yesterday, I coded in PHP. Today, I’m coding in Python. Tomorrow, I’ll be coding in Scala. #justanotherdayinparadise

Reply: no no, you misunderstand. Perl is my one true programming love, the language I return to when I just need to get something done well. It’s just that I have a lot of programming projects this week where I don’t get to pick my own programming language.
tags: some day my perl will come
